overview: These naughty locker room antics will have fans signing up to join the team to get in on all the hardcore action! When Corinna sneaks into the boys' locker room to surprise them, she gets everything she was craving and more, while 'hitting the showers' takes on a whole new meaning! And that's just two of the sweaty scenarios in this release that proves big-tit hotties know just how to 'play ball' and they'll stop at nothing to hit a home run!
title: Big Juggs vs. Thugs
